member.name: T:GHIElectronics.NETMF.Net.NetworkInformation.Dhcp
member.summary:
Provides Dhcp client service with W5100 chipset Ethernet interface.
IMPORTANT: Use this class only with WIZnet W5100 Ethernet TCP/IP Chip.
member.remarks: With this class, your applications can lease IP address and other networking settings through Dhcp service.

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.NETMF.Net.NetworkInformation.Dhcp.EnableDhcp(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Enables the Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) for service with this network interface.
member.param: Specifies the physical of the Ethernet interface.
Specifies the hostname for the DHCP server.

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.NETMF.Net.NetworkInformation.Dhcp.RenewDhcpLease
member.summary: Renews a DHCP lease, which renews the IP address on a DHCP-enabled network interface.

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.NETMF.Net.NetworkInformation.Dhcp.ReleaseDhcpLease
member.summary: Releases the DHCP lease, which releases the IP address bound to a DHCP-enabled network interface.
